definition: Hang Seng index (of Hong Kong stock market)
permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: All but nine stocks on the 42-member Hang Seng Index advanced.
sentences.chinese: 恒生指数的42成员中只有九支股票上涨。

sentences.english: The benchmark Hang Seng Index has gained 6 percent so farin 2010.
sentences.chinese: 截至目前，恒生指数上涨了6%。

sentences.english: The stock is slated to be added to the benchmark Hang Seng index.
sentences.chinese: 该公司股票将成为香港基准恒生指数的成份股。

sentences.chinese: 恒生指数有限公司，版权所有。
